array.name: descriptions
array.item: This app is an encyclopedia of all in-game equipment, creatures, monsters, materials, and treasures. Each category contains information such as the location, description, and image of certain items, creatures, or monsters.
Select the monster category to view all the monsters existing in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. This category also contains information on the items a monster drops once it has been slain.

Select the treasure category to view the information about all the treasures in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. You can find information such as the location and a thorough description of each treasure.
Select the creature category to view all the creatures in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild. Most creatures drop materials that can be used as ingredients for cooking or crafting.
Select the materials category to view all the objects which can be used for crafting items, cooking food, or even sold to shops or merchants in exchange for Rupees.

Select the equipment category to view all items related to swords, shields, and armors. These items can be enhanced with crafting materials. There is a thorough description for each item in the equipment category.
